title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Parasite
overview: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in four tales.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his son.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The life journey of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ but big heart.

title: Joker
overview: In a city full of apathy, a mentally troubled comedian descends into madness.
